abort.forgot_password: The Forgot Password page was detected. This normally is the result of too may failed logins. Amazon may require action before a relogin can be attempted.
abort.login_failed: Alexa Media Player failed to login.

error.connection_error: Fout bij verbinden; controleer netwerk en probeer opnieuw
error.unable_to_connect_hass_url: Kan geen verbinding maken met de Home Assistant-url. Controleer de externe URL onder Configuratie - > Algemeen

data.proxy_warning: Ignore and Continue - I understand that no support for login issues are provided for bypassing this warning.

proxy_warning.description:
The HA server cannot connect to the URL provided: {hass_url}.
> {error}

To fix this, please confirm your **HA server** can reach {hass_url}. This field is from the External Url under Configuration -> General but you can try your internal url.

If you are **certain** your client can reach this url, you can bypass this warning.
proxy_warning.title: Alexa Media Player - Unable to Connect to HA URL

data.registered: OTP from the Built-in 2FA App Key confirmed successfully.

totp_register.title: Alexa Media Player - OTP Confirmation

data.extended_entity_discovery: Inclusief apparaten die zijn verbonden via Echo
data.public_url: Openbare URL om toegang te krijgen tot Home Assistant (inclusief afsluitende '/')
data.queue_delay: Seconden om te wachten om opdrachten in de wachtrij te plaatsen

clear_history.description: Clear last entries from Alexa Voice history for each Alexa account.

email.description: Accounts to clear. Empty will clear all.
email.name: Email address

entries.description: Number of entries to clear from 1 to 50. If empty, clear 50.
entries.name: Number of Entries

clear_history.name: Clear Amazon Voice History

force_logout.description: Force account to logout. Used mainly for debugging.

email.description: Accounts to clear. Empty will clear all.
email.name: Email address

force_logout.name: Force Logout

update_last_called.description: Forces update of last_called echo device for each Alexa account.

email.description: List of Alexa accounts to update. If empty, will update all known accounts.
email.name: Email address

update_last_called.name: Update Last Called Sensor
